title: Effective Learning Activity Design in e-Learning Based on IMS LD

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in operating basic e-learning systems and practical career in language education
context.additional_context: Offline blended learning environment using digital devices (laptops/tablets)

learning_goals: Design learning activity scenarios in three stages (planning-execution-monitoring) using IMS LD Level A specifications
Implement interaction activities specialized for language learning domains (discussions, role-plays, feedback) in an LMS
Analyze formative assessment data to propose improvement plans that enhance learner engagement by 20% or more
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
